subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Perhaps from {{der|zh|mkh}}; compare {{cog|mkh-okm|siṅ||to stay in/at; to abide; to be still}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{och-l|靖}} is the same word ([[ibid.]]).
